section.title: Cloud Admin
section.p: As a Cloud Admin, you can create new domains, projects, users or remove them. You can also give admin privileges to users you create.

section.title: Cloud Admin Activities
section.p: You must log into Horizon via the default domain using a cloud admin username and password to create, modify or remove domains, projects or users. Look at the Project picker at the top of the Horizon UI and ensure that the Default domain and the admin project BOTH have checks beside them. Typically, the demo project is selected by default, and this will cause issues if not changed.

ol.li: Click Identity -> Domains in the sidebar
Click "Create Domain" above the domains list/table
Enter a domain name ("TESTDOMAIN") and description
"Enabled" checkbox is checked by default
Click "Create Domain" button

li.b: Set Domain context to the newly created Domain

ol.li: Click Identity -> Domains in the sidebar (if necessary)
Click "Set Domain Context" button on the newly created domain ("TESTDOMAIN")
Click Identity -> Projects in the sidebar
Click "Create Project" above the projects list/table
Note Domain ID and Name immutably set to the new domain ("TESTDOMAIN")
Enter a project name ("TESTPROJECT") and description
Note the "Enabled" checkbox is checked by default
Click "Create Project" button
Click Identity -> Users in the sidebar
Click "Create User" above the users list/table
Note Domain ID and Name immutably set to the new domain ("TESTDOMAIN")
Enter a user name ("USER1"), description, email address, password
Note the new project ("TESTPROJECT") is preselected
Note the role "_member_" is preselected
Note the "Enabled" checkbox is checked by default
Click "Create User" button

li.b: Remove User from the newly created project

ol.li: Click Identity -> Projects in the sidebar
Click "Manage Members" in the actions column for the project ("TESTPROJECT")
In the right column, click the minus ("-") beside the user ("USER1") to remove them from the project
Click Save to save the change

li.b: Assign Admin role to User within the new Domain

ol.li: Click Identity -> Domains in the sidebar
Click "Manage Members" in the actions column for the domain ("TESTDOMAIN")
If necessary, in the left column, click the plus ("+") beside the user that should be the domain admin.
In the right column, click the dropdown beside the domain admin user ("USER1") and ensure that ONLY the "admin" role is selected by clicking it. Unselect any other roles selected by clicking them.
Click Save to save the change
